sentences.en: Cattle thieves were stealing the rancher's cattle when the cowboys caught them and a necktie party.
sentences.cn: 几个偷牛贼在偷农场的牛时,被牛仔们抓住,被私下绞死了.

sentences.en: Just gave him some pills, replied the rancher.
sentences.cn: 农夫答道:只给它吃了一些药啊.

sentences.en: Loss of livestock left the rancher bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 牲畜的丢失导致牧场主破产.

sentences.en: Papa was a rancher -- he worked with horses.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸是个 牧场主,专门和马打交道.

sentences.en: Sensing a moneymaking mutation, the rancher promptly put the ram out for stud.
sentences.cn: 牧场主人晓得这项突变具有生财的潜力,于是马上就把这只公羊做为种羊.

sentences.en: The next day the rancher finds the remains and the telltale tracks of a jaguar.
sentences.cn: 隔天,牧场主人发现了残骸和一只美洲豹留下的踪迹.

sentences.en: The Rancher is easy to start, thanks to its full transistor ignition with electronic advance.
sentences.cn: 该牧场主很容易开始, 感谢充分发挥其晶体管的电子点火提前.

sentences.en: The rancher must always be on guard against the dangers that nature can create.
sentences.cn: 牧场主必须时刻防备可能发生的自然灾害.

sentences.en: The tramp bailed up the rancher to ask him for some food and drink.
sentences.cn: 流浪汉拦住农场主,要他给点吃的和喝的.

trans.tran_cn: 大牧场主，大农场工人，牧场工人，牧屋
trans.tran_en: someone who owns or works on a ranch
